description: Try our easy to follow Madras Beef Curry With Coconut Yoghurt recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Madras Beef Curry With Coconut Yoghurt
name: Madras Beef Curry With Coconut Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, to make coriander coconut yoghurt, combine all ingredients. Top curry with yoghurt and chopped coriander and serve with pappadums.
